revised_title: Observations on the Annual Parallax of a Lyrae and Refraction Formula Alterations
tldr: The author, John Brinkley, discusses his observations of the star a Lyrae to determine its annual parallax and finds a result of 2°52' as the parallax of the star's annual orbit. He also suggests a small alteration to Dr. Bradley's refraction formula based on his observations of different circumpolar stars and varying temperatures.
